name: Frogs & Flies
description:
Frogs & Flies

HOW TO PLAY

The goal is to eat and avoid flies. If a fly hits a lily pad, it will fly away with it, limiting your movement. If it hits you, CROAK, game over!

Press space to shoot your tongue and try to eat flies. The higher the fly is, the more points you will get.

Use left and right keys to turn and hop. If you are facing the direction you press, you will hop to the next pad. If you are facing the opposite direction, you will turn around.

Use up and down keys to change the angle of your tongue to better hit flies.

COMING SOON

- Leaderboard functionality!

- More skins and new frogs!

- Updated higher res background!

-Small bug fixes. Pun intended!
